function-usage.testenviron: In order to try out the examples, start a command shell and move to folder $FOXPATH/examples-data/oxygen-samples.

example.label: no filter
example.description: Inspecting a set of dita documents - which @xml:lang attribute values are observed in 'term' elements and their ancestors? As no filter is applied, the function call is equivalent to the navigation step ancestor-or-self::node().

example.label: name filter
example.description: Find the 'table', 'ul' and 'ol' elements directly or indirectly containing a @conref. For each element return a relative URI with a name path fragment.

example.label: combined filters
example.description: As the previous example, but return only the innermost 'table' element.
